title: About
subtitle: I'm Arjun Verma. I build software in Gurgaon, India.
description: I'm Arjun Verma. I build software in Gurgaon, India.
content:
I started programming at 8 years old, making shapes and patterns in [Logo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Logo_(programming_language)) on my mom's Compaq Deskpro.

At 15, I watched [Pirates of Silicon Valley](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pirates_of_Silicon_Valley) and [Triumph of the Nerds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Triumph_of_the_Nerds) at a friend's place. Stories of hackers building world-changing companies stuck with me.

Now I live in Gurgaon with my dog [Greg](https://instagram.com/thegoldenboy_greg) and my wife Garima. I run [Hetu Labs](https://hetu-labs.com), a tech consultancy, and I'm building [Stream](https://stream.arjunverma.in), a supply chain tool for garment manufacturers.
